name: Flank That Tank!
description:
Twin Stick Shooter where everything breaks!

Smash through walls, punch through obstacles, every thing is possible in the game with procedural destruction.

In 22 fun-packed levels, you crash through anything to mop up all opponents.
The opponents come in five different difficulty levels.

Use the pick-ups to gain an edge over the enemy.

GAMEPAD REQUIRED

LEFT STICK to move your tank.
RIGHT STICK to aim your gun.
SHOULDER BUTTONS to fire your gun.
